metadata.title: CVE-2020-36659 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache::Session::Browseable before 1.3.6, validity of the X.509certificate is not checked by default when connecting to remote LDAPbackends, because the default configuration of the Net::LDAPS module forPerl is used. NOTE: this can, for example, be fixed in conjunction with theCVE-2020-16093 fix.

criterions.comment: libapache-session-browseable-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
